duties_responsibilities.duty: Report claims to Insurance Carriers, Health Insurance carriers, and obtain statutory liens.
Obtain police reports, send out POE’s, and process DMV requests.
Assist with resolving and facilitating property damage claims.
Request medical records and billing to help prepare cases for demand.
Calculate Howell meds and Loss of Earnings.
Organize electronic files according to internal procedure.
Complete tasks as assigned and delegated in a timely and efficient manner.
Maintain consistency in attendance and punctuality.
Take initiative to see tasks through to completion.
Passion to learn and grow, as training and growth is ongoing.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Law, Paralegal studies, or related field (Preferred)
